item.title: Meet Bambi, ABC7’s Pet of the Week!
item.description: Bambi is an energetic 3-month-old black-mouth cur mix.

item.title: National Guard troops on DC streets for Trump’s crackdown will start carrying guns
item.description: The step is an escalation in Trump’s intervention into policing in the nation’s capital.

item.title: Florida must stop expanding ‘Alligator Alcatraz’ immigration center, judge says
item.description: A federal judge has issued a preliminary injunction to halt expansion of an immigration detention center in the Florida Everglades, known as “Alligator Alcatraz.”

item.title: Sarasota County budget talks end with few cuts, $600K school bill on the horizon
item.description: After years of ballooning budgets, the county’s proposed spending is expected to top $2.5 billion.

item.title: Tour bus rollover kills 5 on interstate highway in western New York
item.description: Police say a tour bus returning to New York City from Niagara Falls crashed Friday, killing and injuring multiple people.

item.title: Epstein’s former girlfriend told Justice Department she did not see Trump act in ‘inappropriate way’
item.description: The Justice Department on Friday released transcripts of interviews its No. 2 official did with Jeffrey Epstein’s imprisoned former girlfriend.

item.title: Man charged with felony littering in Charlotte County
item.description: County staff discovered a large pile of waste material beside the Tippecanoe II Environmental Park.

item.title: 2025 sea turtle hatchlings numbers surpass last year’s totals
item.description: Volunteers have recorded 22,311 hatchlings so far this year.

item.title: The Black Moon and the Perseid meteor shower coincide next week
item.description: The Black Moon rises Aug. 23 which coincides with the last day of the Perseid meteor shower.

item.title: Karen Rose appointed to Sarasota School Board to fill vacancy by Tim Enos
item.description: Gov. Ron DeSantis on Friday announced the appointment of Rose to the school board.

item.title: Morning storms in the forecast
item.description: With onshore or west flow and a some pieces of energy moving in we can expect to see some morning showers and thunderstorms
